knimeNode.name: Term to String
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts terms to strings and adds a new column containing these strings.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to convert terms of a defined column into strings and attach a new column containing the these strings. The tags of the terms get lost, since only the words of the terms are converted.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the terms to convert into strings.

ports.inPort: An input data table containing term cells.
ports.outPort: An output table containing the input data with an additional string cell column.
